album.title: Tonight Not Again/Live at Eagles Ballroom

track.name: The Remedy (I Won't Worry)
comments: I should tape "I won't worry my life away" on my back cuz i worry about everything, lol!!  Love the phrase "You can turn off the sun but i'm STILL gonna shine :-)  One of his best songs ever!!
still one of my favourite songs of all time--never fails to put me in a good mood.
Wow. This is still one of the best songs I've ever heard. It's so bittersweet though, it makes me feel so nostalgic ;_;
quality artist!

Man, I second 100% the two people below me.  One of the best Jason Mraz songs. I was incredibly stressed so I played (don't laugh) "Happy, Upbeat, Singer-Songwriter" multi tag radio.  This was the first song and it's really working to make me calm down a bit. :D
I love THIS Jason Mraz, not the acoustic crap he's been putting out lately.
Just calms me, when im stressed, Perfect!
the acoustic version is better
nice, but acoustic version is IMHO better
horrible version
This is soooo much better than "I'm Yours" or anything else he's ever done, people are stupid.
happiness:)
YOU CAN TURN OFF THE SUN BUT I'M STILL GONNA SHINEEEE
this always puts me in a good mood.
alwayss loved jason mraz.  & as this is the first song of his that i remember, i love it :)
one of the only few JM songs I listen to

@RoomForSymmetry  Thanks for the backstory - v inspiring.
I love this song and Mr. Mraz, nearly every track he's ever made is a classic.

How can you forget the past when your memories wont leave you alone.
written by Michael Gates
I remember listening to this song as a kid...Man those were some good times!
Isn't this from the album "Waiting for My Rocket to Come"?
